description:
You should meet me to know how I am : ) I really love to meet persons, i love you travels, listen different stories, cultural intercambie, languaje exchange, fun, don't hesitate to contact me: (send your request any time, or messagge) I love to try everything, naturaleza, sunset, art, desing, music live, fun. We enjoy people who are open mind, interesting.

I SEARCH WOMAN honest, sincere, interesting, who like to travel, history, culture autenthic, music, walk in nature, enjoy the house, affectionate, magical look,
intent: Fun, Friendship, Romance, Serious Relationship, Marriage
